
<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Size
When the `size` property is set to `small`, the chip will render
with a smaller height and gap.

## Dependencies

### Depends on

- [limel-chip](..)
- [limel-example-controls](../../../examples)
- [limel-select](../../select)
